member.name: M:HRWebApp.Controllers.JobOffersController.GetJobOffers
member.returns: All available Job Offers in JSON format

member.name: M:HRWebApp.Controllers.JobOffersController.GetJobOffer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a Job Offer by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the desired Job Offer
member.returns: Job Offer data in JSON format

member.name: M:HRWebApp.Controllers.JobOffersController.PutJobOffer(System.Int32,HRWebApp.Models.JobOffer)
member.remarks: Indepotent method, putting the same object multiple times has the same effet as putting one.
member.param: ID of existing or new Job Offer
Job Offer instance to add or update
member.returns: 204 No Content response if updated Job Offer is valid, 400 Bad Request otherwise

member.name: M:HRWebApp.Controllers.JobOffersController.PostJobOffer(HRWebApp.Models.JobOffer)
member.returns: new Job Offer with 201 Created response if Job Offer is valid, 400 Bad Request otherwise

member.name: M:HRWebApp.Controllers.JobOffersController.DeleteJobOffer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a Job Offer with given ID.
member.param: ID of Job Offer to delete
member.returns: Deleted Job Offer data in JSON format
